div.a: We need your help with a survey!

div.div: We need your help with a survey! In a national effort to minimize the presence of lead and copper in our drinking water, the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality is requiring all Texas public water systems to submit inventories of our service li...Read more...

div.a: Public Hearing on Proposed Property Tax Rate for City of Big Sandy

div.div: The City of Big Sandy will hold a public hearing/meeting at 5:30 pm on August 29, 2024 at The Heritage Center, 162 East Gilmer St, Big Sandy, TX 75755 to consider adopting a proposed tax rate for tax year 2024. The proposed tax rate is $0.438000 per ...Read more...

div.a: 2024-2025 City of Big Sandy Tax Rate Calculation Worksheets

div.div: Upshur County Assessor-Collector Luana Howell has prepared the 2024-2025 Tax Rate Calculation worksheets for the City of Big Sandy. You can download the worksheets here: 2024 Tax Rate Calculation Worksheet.pdfRead more...

The proposed budget for the October 1, 2024 - September 30, 2025: Proposed Budget.pdf The City Council will be holding a public hearing on the proposed tax rate on August 29, 2024 at 5:30 p.m. at the Big Sandy Heritage Center, 162 E Gilmer Street, Bi...Read more...
